sub_title: Instrumentation and Control Engineer at Worley
summary: Skilled Instrument & Control/ Automation Engineer with 4 years of international work experience in Oil & Gas EPCM projects, petrochemical industry, manufacturing processes. Having solid educational background in Process Automation, Mechatronics, I am passionate about various industrial applications of Instrument & Control, Automation Engineering.

projects:
[{'title': 'BP Caspian EPCM Project', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': '$500 million valued brownfield contract with BP-operated projects, to deliver engineering, procurement, construction and management (EPCM) services to eight facilities of BP Caspian offshore Azerbaijan including Chirag, Central Azeri – Production Drilling Quarters, Central Azeri – Compression and Water Processing, East Azeri Production Drilling Quarters, West Azeri- Production Drilling Quarters, Deep Water Gunashli – Drilling & Utility Quarters, Deep Water Gunashli – Pressure Compression and Water Utilities and Shah Deniz Stage.

Individually involved in Instrument & Control scope and responsible for successful delivery of following projects within subject contract:

-2 Oil Production and Gas Lift Flowlines 
- Dual to Single flowline conversion
- Multi Zone Water Injection full Flowline
- Water Injection to Multi Zone Water Injection Conversion Flowline
- First Multi Zone Oil Production Flowline installation in AGT (Azerbaijan-Georgia-Turkey) region, designed and delivered at Central Azeri platform
- 2 PIT modification projects each of them required additional 2 annulus Pressure Transmitter and  installation on X-mass tree wellhead along with relevant software configuration on ICSS', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Nazrin', 'last_name': 'Rzayeva, MSc, MIET', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Instrumentation and Control Engineer at Worley'}]}]
